column1: Chambas is a municipality and town in the Ciego de Ávila Province of Cuba.
It is located in the northern part of the province
column2: bordering the municipalities of Morón and Florencia
column3: as well as the province of Sancti Spíritus. To the north it borders the Bay of Buena Vista and the Laguna de Leche.

column1: It comprises the villages of El Asiento
column10: Punta San Juan (Maxímo Gómez Sugar Mill) and Ranchuelo.

column2: the municipality of Chambas had a population of 39
column3: 868. With a total area of 769 km2 (297 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 51.8/km2 (134/sq mi).
